column5: I'm kinda new to the fishing scene and was hoping on hitting some great locations to catch some fish in cambridge. My issue is I have no boat or access to a boat. Can't seem to find any solid locations to catch a fighter. Any help would be appreciated.
The Speed and Grand Rivers. There is great multi -species fishing from shore. If it's fighters you want try carp.
Any specific spots along the grand?
Right in town is great for carp.
Walk the rivers, look for deep holes, cast lures into them.  When you start catching fish do not go on the Internet and start broadcasting where you caught them.
